Title: WebsitePanel Skin Designer Toolkit
Description: WebsitePanel Skin Designer Toolkit is a windows forms project designed to create skins for the Open-Source hosting control panel WebsitePanel. It allows you to change the colors, borders and many other CSS settings and also change the default images.
HomeWiki:
Project Description
WebsitePanel Skin Designer Toolkit is a windows forms project designed to create skins for the Open-Source hosting control panel WebsitePanel. It allows you to change the colors, borders and many other CSS settings and also change the default images.

The project now also has a home: http://www.kenneth-truyers.net/projects/websitepanel-skin-designer-toolkit/
